snippet: Russian officials want to give the ruble a symbol that would become as easily recognizable as those for the dollar and the euro.
abstract: Russian officials want to give the ruble a symbol that will become as easily recognizable as those for the dollar and the euro.
lead_paragraph: Russian officials want to give the ruble a symbol that would become as easily recognizable as those for the dollar and the euro.

headline.main: Ruble Hopes to Join Ranks of the $ and €
headline.print_headline: Ruble Hopes To Join Ranks Of the $ and €
